projects.title: Grassroots
projects.bodyText:
- For my MSc dissertation, I created a mobile app that attempts to solve a real-world problem in the youth football community (UK).
-  Grassroots provides a platform for youth football coaches to easily schedule friendly games for their teams.
- The app allows coaches to host or search for available games in their teams' age and skill categories.
- The project was suggested and backed by coaches of the England Youth Football Association (Sussex and Kent counties).

projects.title: TravelBuddy
projects.bodyText:
- Social Media platform for travellers to share their experiences and connect with other travellers.
- Users can create posts, like and comment on posts, follow other users and chat with them.
 - Users can also create an itinerary for their trip and invite other users to join in.

projects.title: Pokemon Draft League
projects.bodyText:
- I was hired by the PoGo Raids Discord server as a freelance developer to create a site to host their draft league tournaments, displaying member's teams and scoreboards.
- The website allows trainers to customize their teams and input results from their matches, although the latter is still in development.

projects.title: Payment App
projects.bodyText:
- A secure online application that enable users to make payments and request payments from other users
- It includes a notification system for requests and a page to look at transaction history.
-I created this application as part of my second semester.
- The application is equipped with protection against CSRF, XSS and SQL Injection.

projects.title: Pokemon Go Dex
projects.bodyText:
- As a pet project, I worked building an interactive pokedex for the mobile game Pokemon Go.
- The app currently displays all pokemon available in the game, their typing and the ability to check which pokemon have their shiny form available, which of course displays the shiny sprite.
- I also plan to add more information such as moves learned and evolution information for each pokemon, at a later date.

projects.title: 2D and 3D Puzzle Algorithms
projects.bodyText: - As part of my Software Engineering module, my team and I worked on solving various popular 2D and 3D puzzles, including N-Queens and a polysphere puzzle (2D and 3D).

projects.title: Inbound
projects.bodyText:
- Local basketball matches in Bangalore are only followed by those who are aware of the timings as well as the locations of these matches. 
 - This results in enthusiasts missing out on opportunities to watch local matches. The purpose of the system is to create an android application that will help network all members of the basketball community in Bangalore.
